snippet.title: Pandemic Express Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
You spawn in a train station with other survivors. One of you turns into a zombie and infects everyone. Get to the train to escape from the infected, or get caught and hunt remaining survivors. A new type of multiplayer game by tinyBuild. Sign-up for the alpha - https://pandemicexpress.com

Soundtrack by: Маяк
Track: Новые Дома
Link: https://majak.bandcamp.com/track/--11
